pr_title: Workaround for the platform http not be able to handle matchOnUriPrefix

timeline.message: Workaround for the platform http not be able to handle matchOnUriPrefix
Workaround for the platform http not be able to handle matchOnUriPrefix

timeline.bodyText: Shouldn't we warn at least that matchOnUriPrefix is ignored?
timeline.author: ppalaga

replies.bodyText: we could but actually the property is only added by platform-http component itself (when generating rest endpoints) even if it is not a property it  is able to handle so basically it would warn itself
replies.author: lburgazzoli
